Name: Brandt Consumable
Description:
Manufacturer: Shubin Interstellar
Item Type: Mining Consumable

Instability: -50%
Charge Window Rate: -50%
Heat Generation: +10%
Signature Size: +20%
Duration: 30 seconds
Charges: 3

Strategically use this consumable to crack unstable rocks. The Brandt provides 30 seconds of stabilized power to decrease a mining laser's charge rate while also reducing a deposit's instability.
